docs.lead_paragraph: Proposals to reduce care for the mentally ill are being scrutinized after a troubled young man’s shooting rampage in Tucson left 6 people dead and 13 wounded.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republicans will find the next steps difficult as they seek consensus on “free market solutions” to control health costs and expand coverage.

headline.seo: Health Care Law Repeal Voted in House

docs.lead_paragraph: With House Republicans planning to approve a bill on Wednesday that would repeal the big health care overhaul, Democrats on Tuesday ramped up their efforts to defend the law.

headline.main: Democrats Make a Case for the Health Care Law

docs.abstract: Republicans in the House plan to introduce a bill on Wednesday to repeal the health care overhaul.

docs.lead_paragraph: Federal drug officials have warned that the typical effects of smoking salvia could closely mimic psychosis.

docs.lead_paragraph: Most people say they’ll pay for genetic tests even if the predictions are sometimes wrong, and most people don’t seem to be traumatized even when they receive bad news.
